content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 781.0 - Applicability

State Regulations

The following rules and regulations are applicable to
equipment operated by or for, but not owned by authorized carriers of
passengers in intrastate commerce subject to article 7 of the Transportation

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
781.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
